abstraction

Class ACharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • abstraction.ACharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ILookable, IPrototype, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultCharacter

    public abstract class ACharacter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPrototype, ILookable
    Abstract class used to implements characters.
    Author:
    Fabricio Ceciliano, Carlos Esquivel, Marco Gamboa, Diego Murillo

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ACharacter()
      Creates a character with the default information.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ACharacter

        public ACharacter()
        Creates a character with the default information.

      • ACharacter

        public ACharacter(java.lang.String name,
                  java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,AAppearance> appearances,
                  int currentHealthPoints,
                  int maxHealthPoints,
                  int hitsPerUnit,
                  int level,
                  int tiles,
                  int unlockLevel,
                  int cost,
                  java.util.ArrayList<AWeapon> weapons,
                  int coorditateX,
                  int coorditateY)
        Creates a character with the specified information.
        Parameters:
        name - Character's name.
        appearances - Character's TreeMap containing the level and the corresponding string list of appearances.
        currentHealthPoints - Character's current health points.
        maxHealthPoints - Character's max health points.
        hitsPerUnit - Character's hits per unit of time value.
        level - Character's level.
        tiles - Character's spaciousness in a space unit.
        unlockLevel - Character's unlock level.
        cost - Character's cost.
        weapons - Character's arraylist containing it's weapons.
        coorditateX - Character's X coordinate used in a space unit.
        coorditateY - Character's Y coordinate used in a space unit.

      • setAppearance

        public void setAppearance(int level,
                          AAppearance appearance)
        Sets the specific appearance in the specified level. If the appearance already exists, it's replace.
        Specified by:
        setAppearance in interface ILookable
        Parameters:
        level - The level to link the appearance.
        appearance - The new character's appearance.
        See Also:
        ILookable

      • useWeapon

        public abstract void useWeapon(AWeapon weapon,
                               ACharacter character)
        Abstract method used to employ a weapon in a character.
        Parameters:
        weapon - The weapon that will be used.
        character - The character who is going to be affected by the weapon.

      • useWeapon

        public abstract void useWeapon(int index,
                               ACharacter character)
                        throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Abstract method used to employ in a Character a AWeapon from a specific index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the AWeapon in the character's weapons arraylist.
        character - The character who is going to be affected by the weapon.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If index is not in the AWeapon's list bounds.

        public abstract void takeDamage(int damage)

        damage - The damage the character will receive.

      • deleteWeapon

        public abstract void deleteWeapon(int index)
                           throws java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException
        Abstract method used to remove a weapon from a specific index in the character's weapons list.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of the weapon that will be removed.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - If the index is not in the ACharacter's weapons list bounds.
